item.title: Bones on altar [517] MOVE THIS
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“owns reece, post:1, topic:393089”]hi guys this is how to add bones on alter
first goto itemonobject in your source open it then paste this in it:

case 409: if (itemId == 536) { //dragon bones pray Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(player, 536, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(player, 536), 1); player.requestAnim(713, 0); player.requestGFX(520, 2); player.appendExperience(7000, 5); player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "You give the bones as in a sacrifice to (your name here)."); } break;
save, compile, run, spawn bones and use them on alter :)[/quote]

This is a snippet not a tutorial.

Read full topic

item.title: Bones on altar [517] MOVE THIS
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

hi guys this is how to add bones on altar
first goto itemonobject in your source open it then paste this in it:

case 409: if (itemId == 536) { //dragon bones pray Engine.playerItems.deleteItem(player, 536, Engine.playerItems.getItemSlot(player, 536), 1); player.requestAnim(713, 0); player.requestGFX(520, 2); player.appendExperience(7000, 5); player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player, "You give the bones as in a sacrifice to (your name here)."); } break;
save, compile, run, spawn bones and use them on altar
